price: (5) [Every] matter [proceeding] from Us. Indeed, We were to send [a messenger]
arabic: أَمۡرٗا مِّنۡ عِندِنَآۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُرۡسِلِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: amran min ʿindinā innā kunnā mur'silīna
